pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Constrained Based Modelling // This Systems Biology Package (Gelius-Dietrich et. al. (2012) doi:10.1186/1752-0509-7-125) implements algorithms for constraint based analyses of metabolic networks, e.g. flux- balance analysis (FBA), minimization of metabolic adjustment (MOMA), regulatory on/off minimization (ROOM), robustness analysis and flux variability analysis. The package is easily extendable for additional algorithms. Most of the current LP/MILP solvers are supported via additional packages.
